example.code:
PS C:\> Join-ELBSecurityGroupToLoadBalancer -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -SecurityGroup sg-87654321
sg-87654321
example.description: This example replaces the current security group for the specified load balancer with the specified security group.

example.code:
PS C:\> Join-ELBSecurityGroupToLoadBalancer -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer -SecurityGroup @("sg-12345678", "sg-87654321")
sg-12345678 sg-87654321
example.description: To keep the current security group and specify an additional security group, specify both the existing and new security groups.
